content: Hello, pussycat.
Oh, really?
A lot of ladies get right in the car
after that line, you creepy piece of...
Jack!
What do ya...
Oh, I'm sorry.
Oh, hi.

When did you get
back from D.C.?

How did you get out
of your government job?

Uh, I'm not at liberty
to discuss that.

That information
is classified

at least until
Cheney dies.

Which is going to be a
long time from now.
That man is mostly metal.

The important
thing is I'm here

and I'm going to get
my old job back.

Yes, please
come back, Jack.
Devin is the worst.

It's like he doesn't even
care when we should have cake

for people whose birthdays
are on the weekend.
The Friday before.
At lunch.

So what's with the
outfit, Lemon?

Did the people at
that makeover show

finally respond
to your letter?

Ah, no, I am
dressed up

because the adoption
agency is doing
my home evaluation today.
Just be yourself, Lemon.

I'm going to be
better than myself.
My apartment is spotless.

I have practiced
all my answers.

I got rid of all my
Colin Firth movies

in case they
consider them erotica.

That man can
wear a sweater.

There is no chance
that I'm blowing this.

What can I
do for you, Jack?

Devin, I know we've had

but I want to offer
my assistance
to you and Kathy.
That's funny, Jack.

You see, only thing Kathy

is deciding which John
Mayer song to do it to.
Oh, come on, Banks.
You sold off Small Appliances.

Sheinhardt Wigs missed
projections for last quarter.

And I hear that theme

any of the stuff

Rumor has it you're
in over your head.

Well, you know what they

They make a "rue" out

Yes, we've had some setbacks.

but Kathy and I have
everything under control.
Ah!

Don't even think about talking
to her when her soaps are on.
Seriously, she will bite you.
You owe me a job, Banks.

You know her father
wanted me to take over

before he slipped
into that coma.

If there's one thing
I learned from you, Jack,

it's keep your
friends close
and your enemies so close
that you're almost kissing.

So that's why I'm gonna
offer you a job...
in the mail room.
I'll take it.
Great news, guys!

I just got a residual check from
that Japanese commercial I did.

I still don't know how that
advertised Tokyo University.

But I'm gonna use this $300 to
buy us all some boots for me.
It's official!
I'm a genius.
My video game
is selling through the rizznoof!

Well, how far through

Whoa, that's not slang.
He has a speech impediment.
61 million copies at $60 each.

Well, you know, you didn't make
this video game alone, Tracy.
A lot of people helped.
I don't know.
I think I did it alone...

and this check
is the prizznoof.

Now that one was just
him being obnoxious.
Thank you.
Jack?
I'm back, Lemon.

Devin thought he
could humiliate me.

But he doesn't understand
that I've worked my way up

from the bottom before
and I can do it again.

The last time, it
took me 22 years.

But I know so much
more now this time.
I think I can do it in nine.

So you're gonna be
a mail room guy?
I'm the head mail room guy.

I've already been promoted
once since this morning.
That's pretty fast.
With a little hard work,
I'll be back to V.P. status
before I'm 60.

And if my home
evaluation goes well
I will be a mother by 50.
We really can have it all.

What was your reason
for wanting to adopt?
Thank you for that question, Bev.
The world is a troubled place.

And with so many children
in need of adoption worldwide,
Any other...
Infertility... or "other"?
"Other".
How old are you, Liz?
Thirty-seven.
I should tell you right now

it's important that
you don't lie.

How often do you entertain
gentlemen sex guests?
Oh, boy, that's uh...
Once a year maybe?
But I'd be open to cutting that down.
Is that a safety thing?
Because I can fix that.

You ever run a webcam
ring outta here, Liz?

Gentlemen tell you
what to do, you do it?
At first with some feigned hesitation?
No!
Is that on the form?

Have you ever been
convicted of a crime?

I was arrested once in
Germany for public nudity.

It was a shipyard.
You're a T.V. writer, Liz?

How many hours per

Between 60 and 80.

Your work life seems
very demanding.

Maybe I should pop

young shoulders.

With all due

he's a party boy with
a grown man's job.

I want to be of service.
Let me help you.
Oh!
Oh!

Hi...

Well, you will see and then

conversation.

Psst.

Who?

Kathy Geiss, she touched

No... Kathy?

It made me very
uncomfortable.

It's not at all
erotic and fun,

do it to women.

Have you ever been

Of course not.
Of course not.

How far would I have to let

Are we talking over the shirt?
Frontsies, backsies?

Ew.

The only path is

I'm now Director

Ha... oh.
Nice work, Hornberger.
Are these dolls?
Are they?
Mommy.
They're called Little Creepers.

Oh, you will.

that's a person, right?

I should get my rap

No, I want you to

Especially Jenna.
Noblesse oblige, yes.
Let's go shopping.
To the Batmobile!
Don't worry, he's just leasing it.
Oh, good.

What I'm saying is don't

dress for the job
you want to have.
So now, Manny...
Tomorrow I show up for work
dressed as a Mexican wrestler.
Ow, ow.
Banks?
Jack...

Good God, what

Where are your shoes?
Oh, damn it.
Must have left them in...
my business meeting.

Banks, you've got to

You've got a

Oh, I'm running it.

How are you possibly going to do that?

The old-fashioned
way, Jack.
I'm gonna shut it down.

I'm gonna shut the whole

Are you insane?

Think about the jobs,
the economy.
This is G.E.
It's just "G" now, Jack.
I sold the "E" to Samsung.
They're "Samesung" now.

I was supposed to be

five hours ago.
Which way's Connecticut?
Oh, hi, may I help you?
Ah, I'm Bev.
I'm here to do Liz's adoption evaluation.
Of course!

I think adoption
is a wonderful thing.

Three of my nine
siblings were adopted.

And someday, I'm
gonna find them.
Bev, hi!
Thank you, Kenneth.
So this is our studio.

It would be a really fun

Lots of costumes...
Watch out, you idiot!
Jackass!

We're like a
big family here.
Hey, Rick.
I'm Fred.
Rick is the other black guy.

Happens to everyone,

Yeah, happens all the
time to my black husband.
Well, I first met Liz in 1993.

And can I just say something?
Total gentleman.
Liz is a really, really mature person

It's not a custody case.

Then who were those kids you

Those were

'cause I shot one of my

Did you bring it up?

Not terrific,

Yes, I am provocative.

please accept this set

Fun! Bye.

Tell me, tell me!

Mr. Banks...

Devin's here!
Cover yourself.

You smell like

That's the lip

so I could be

Is this the way my life
is supposed to play out?

The kid who walked four

because mother said that golf
was a game for businessmen.

Paid his way
through Princeton

by working the day
shift at that graveyard

and the graveyard
shift at that Days Inn.

Twenty two years of
single-mindedly fighting

my way to the top
of this company.

Thank God I don't have your
biological need for children.

That would make
success impossible.
Thanks.
This job is all I've ever wanted, Lemon.

And now it hinges on how far

for an obese child.

Are you sure

Maybe she's just

Oh, nerds, it's Bev.
Please be charming.

I have not.

Some coupons

No!

Bev, allow

"Unsatisfactory"?

20 minutes.

Right this way.
